poems.title: Blank Canvas
poems.body:
White space waiting,
Infinite possibilities—
One brushstroke changes all.

poems.title: Spark
poems.body:
A thought ignites,
Tiny ember in darkness.
Fan it to flame.

poems.title: The Muse Calls
poems.body:
She whispers secrets
In languages of color,
Sound, and memory.

poems.title: Uncharted Paths
poems.body:
No maps exist
For the journey ahead—
You make the way by walking.

poems.title: Creation's Dance
poems.body:
Chaos and order,
Partners in eternal waltz.
Beauty emerges.

poems.title: Mind Untethered
poems.body:
Break the chains of
'Should' and 'always been'—
Fly toward the unknown.

poems.title: First Light
poems.body:
Something from nothing,
A universe born from void—
Your hands, creating.

poems.title: Permission
poems.body:
The greatest gift:
Allowing yourself to fail,
Then try once more.

poems.title: Connecting Dots
poems.body:
Old ideas meeting,
Forming unexpected bonds—
New life emerges.

poems.title: The Inner Well
poems.body:
Deep within you:
Endless source of wonder waits.
Draw from it daily.
